product_name: REI Tech Wrap Laptop Sleeve - Small
long_description: The small-size REI Tech Wrap sleeve has a soft, sleek profile and is designed to offer versatile protection for your 13 in. laptop. It also meets TSA requirements with a checkpoint-friendly design.
short_description: The small-size REI Tech Wrap sleeve has a soft, sleek profile and is designed to offer versatile protection for your 13 in. laptop. It also meets TSA requirements with a checkpoint-friendly design.
